title: The History and Tradition of Baseball
summary: Explore the roots and popularity of baseball, a beloved sport with deep American history.
author: John

body.raw: Baseball is a sport deeply rooted in American history. It involves two teams taking turns batting and fielding over nine innings. The strategy, skill, and tradition of baseball make it one of the most beloved sports worldwide.
